text.section: Nothing in this subtitle shall be construed to require an insurer to obtain a license as an insurance producer. As used in this section, the term "insurer" does not include an insurer's officers, directors, employees, subsidiaries, or affiliates.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 273, sec. 13, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 6, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 9, sec. 9, effective June 18, 1970.
